name: "Intellectual Disability"
description: "Intellectual disability (intellectual developmental disorder) is a disorder with onset during the developmental period that includes both intellectual and adaptive functioning deficitsin conceptual
column9: and practical domains. The following three criteria must be met:

name: such as reasoning
column9: confirmed byboth clinical assessment and individualized

id: B. Deficits in adaptive functioning that result in failure to meet developmental and sociocultural standards for personal independence and social responsibility. Without ongoing support
name: the adaptive deficits limit functioning in one or more activities of daily life

id: C. Onset of intellectual and adaptive deficits during the developmental period."
